mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "TRAINER" VALUES( SEQ_TRAINER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{trainerEmail}, #{trainerPw}, #{trainerNickname}, #{trainerTel}, NULL, #{qualification}, DEFAULT)
mapper.select: SELECT TRAINER_NO, TRAINER_EMAIL, TRAINER_PW, TRAINER_NICKNAME, TRAINER_TEL, SALES, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') ENROLL_DATE, GENDER, QUALIFICATION_NO FROM "TRAINER" JOIN "QUALIFICATION" USING(TRAINER_NO) WHERE TRAINER_EMAIL = #{trainerEmail} AND TRAINNER_DEL_FL = 'N'
SELECT TRAINER_PW FROM "TRAINER" WHERE TRAINER_NO = #{trainerNo} AND TRAINNER_DEL_FL = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE TRAINER_IMG SET TRAINER_IMG_MAIN = #{images[0]}, TRAINER_IMG_MAIN_SUB = #{images[1]}, TRAINER_IMG_SUB = #{images[2]}, TRAINER_IMG_SUB_SUB = #{images[3]} WHERE TRAINER_NO = #{trainerNo}
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, TITLE, DETAIL, TRAINER_NICKNAME, BOARD_TYPE_NAME FROM "BOARD" JOIN TRAINER ON (BOARD.TRAINER_NO = TRAINER.TRAINER_NO) JOIN BOARD_TYPE ON (BOARD.CLASS_NO = BOARD_TYPE.BOARD_TYPE_NO) WHERE TRAINER.TRAINER_NO = #{trainerNo} ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT TRAINER_IMG_MAIN, TRAINER_IMG_MAIN_SUB, TRAINER_IMG_MAIN_SUB, TRAINER_IMG_SUB_SUB, TRAINER_NICKNAME, QUALIFICATION_NO FROM TRAINER_IMG JOIN QUALIFICATION USING(TRAINER_NO) WHERE TRAINER_NO = #{trainerNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QUALIFICATION WHERE TRAINER_NO = #{trainerNo} ORDER BY QUALIFICATION_DATE DESC
